mapper.sql: RptVst_Auto, TradeItem_Auto, Visit_Auto, VstType, VstDT, VstAddr, Fee, OutComing, Aim, Summary, Detail, Thought, Remark, CUser, CDT, NextVstDT, [Status], CustSource, SignMap, SignLongitude, SignLatitude, MUser, MCDT, GPS_ID
mapper.select:
select a.Visit_Auto,a.vstType,a.vstAddr, a.VstDT,a.RptVst_Auto,a.TradeItem_Auto, d.ItemName vstTypeName from RptVst a left join TradeItem c on a.TradeItem_Auto=c.TradeItem_Auto left join v_Emp b on b.User_Auto = a.CUser left join ItemCode d on d.ItemType=1042 and d.Num = a.VstType where 1=1
AND c.FName LIKE '%${customerName}%'
AND a.CUser = #{userAuto}
order by a.Visit_Auto

select a.RptVst_Auto, a.VstDT,c.FName customerName,h.ItemName custSourceName,f.ItemName vstTypeName,a.Fee, d.Title contName,a.vstAddr,e.ItemName+'_'+e.Memo outComingName,a.NextVstDT, a.Aim,a.Summary,a.Detail,a.Thought,a.Remark, a.TradeItem_Auto,a.VstType,a.OutComing,d.ContectType from RptVst a left join Contect d on a.TradeItem_Auto=d.TradeItem_Auto left join TradeItem c on a.TradeItem_Auto=c.TradeItem_Auto left join ItemCode f on f.ItemType=1042 and f.Num = a.VstType left join ItemCode e on e.ItemType=1043 and e.Num = a.OutComing left join ItemCode h on h.ItemType=313 and h.Num = a.CustSource where a.RptVst_Auto=#{rptVstAuto}

declare @types int, @num int set @types = #{types} set @num = #{num}
if(@types = 1)--客户来源 begin if(@num != 0) select Num,ItemName from ( select Num=-1,ItemName=null,0 seq union all select Num,ItemName,seq from ItemCode where ItemType=313 and V1 > 0 union all select Num=1,ItemName='保有维系',98 seq union all select Num=2,ItemName='通路维系',99 seq )aa where Num=@num order by seq else select Num,ItemName from ( select Num=-1,ItemName=null,0 seq union all select Num,ItemName,seq from ItemCode where ItemType=313 and V1 > 0 union all select Num=1,ItemName='保有维系',98 seq union all select Num=2,ItemName='通路维系',99 seq )aa order by seq end
else if(@types = 2)--活动内容 begin if(@num != 0) select Num,ItemName from ItemCode where ItemType=1042 and Num=@num else select Num,ItemName from ItemCode where ItemType=1042 end
else if(@types = 3)--进度 begin if(@num != 0) select Num,(ItemName +'_'+ Memo)ItemName from ItemCode where ItemType=1043 and Num=@num else select Num,(ItemName +'_'+ Memo)ItemName from ItemCode where ItemType=1043 end
